pst.pipeline.PstPlotter¶

class pst.view.PstPlotter.PstPlotter(interactive=True, plot_dir=None, plot_name_tmpl='{objectId}.png', defconf=None, logger=None)¶

  • implement the following functions:

-> __init__() ->

static compute_contours(proportions, samples, nside=64)¶

Plot containment contour around desired level. E.g 90% containment of a PDF on a healpix map

galaxy dot plots: pstgalaxies: 1. PstGetGalaxies obj 2. PstGetGalaxies obj list color: list

static obstime(t=None)¶

define observing time t: None, or float, unit in sec, or astropy.time
